tool_description: Conducts market research to understand vendor landscape, pricing benchmarks, and industry trends for informed vendor selection.

industry_sector.description: Industry sector for market research focus

geographic_scope.description: Geographic scope for market research: local, national, or global

research_depth.description: Research depth level: overview, standard, or comprehensive

pricing_analysis_required.description: Whether to include pricing benchmark analysis

error_messages: Invalid geographic scope: Must be one of [local, national, global]
Invalid research depth: Must be one of [overview, standard, comprehensive]

Research timeout: Market research process exceeded allocated time
usage: Specify industry_sector, service_category, and geographic_scope for targeted market research. Adjust research_depth based on detail requirements.

market_size_estimate.description: Estimated market size for the service category

leading_vendors.description: Names of leading vendors in the market

research_summary.description: Comprehensive summary of market research findings
